page.title: 12TATTON GARDEN SOCIETY
page.content: THE TATTON GARDEN SOCIETY WAS FORMED SOME TWENTY YEARS AGO BY A GROUP OF {ENTHUSIASTS}TO ENCOURAGE{BOTANICAL AND {HORTICULTURAL INTERESTS};IT IS AFFILIATED TO THE R.H.S. THE WALLED KITCHEN GARDEN HAS BEEN TRANSFORMED TO HOLD A WIDE VARIETY OF PLANTS AND SHRUBS CLEARLY LABELLED. TRIAL BEDS ARE PLANTED TO COMPARE MERITS OF SPECIES, FOR EXAMPLE, THIS YEAR ANNUAL HERBS, TAYBERRIES AND PEAS AND BEANS WERE SOME OF THE VARIETIES GROWN.MEMBERS ARE ENCOURAGED TO HELP IN THE GARDEN OR WITH ADMINISTRATION AND HOLD PLANT SALES. MEMBERS RECEIVE AN A{QUARTERLY MAGAZINE,}ACCESS TO THE GARDEN AND PARKING FOR Â£8 P.A. AN EXTENSIVE REFERENCE AND LOAN{LIBRARY HAS BEEN BUILT UP. VISITS TO GARDENS IN SUMMER,{LECTURES}IN WINTER AND SOCIAL EVENTS ARE ENJOYED BY THE I800 MEMBERS.
